item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, September 14, 2024 at 2:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Trump re-election bid being derailed by far-right influencers, allies fear
2. Biden indicates shift in Ukraine’s deployment of Storm Shadow missiles
3. Tories pay £2,000 to cling on to ministerial red boxes
4. ‘It’s ugly’: Trump’s Haitian pet-eating claim fractures Ohio city
5. The Murdoch succession saga reaches its ‘end game’
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, September 14, 2024 at 2:10 PM UTC
